verses.verse: In my distress, <S%H6869><s%> I cried <S%H7121><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> He answered me. <S%H6030><s%>
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> from lying <S%H8267><s%> lips, <S%H8193><s%> from a deceitful <S%H7423><s%> tongue. <S%H3956><s%>
What will be given <S%H5414><s%> to you, <S%H3254><s%> and what will be done more to you, <S%H7423><s%> you deceitful tongue? <S%H3956><s%>
Sharp <S%H8150><s%> arrows <S%H2671><s%> of the mighty, <S%H1368><s%> with coals <S%H1513><s%> of juniper. <S%H7574><s%>
Woe <S%H190><s%> is me, <S%H1481><s%> that I live in Meshech, <S%H4902><s%> that I dwell <S%H7931><s%> among the tents <S%H168><s%> of Kedar! <S%H6938><s%>
My soul <S%H5315><s%> has had her dwelling <S%H7931><s%> too long <S%H7227><s%> with him who hates <S%H8130><s%> peace. <S%H7965><s%>
I am for peace, <S%H7965><s%> but when I speak, <S%H1696><s%> they are for war. <S%H4421><s%>
